channel.title: Dream Village Recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Dream Village Recruiting"

item.title: Re: Dream Village Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Hello Again everyone…. Dream Village is a Great Village with 81 Upgrades and I'm here to ask if anyone could send over a alt for a day we need 5 more members to buy Hard Corps if you like the Crazy Place feel free to stay but just Droping by so we could get this killer upgrade would be Wounderfull of you

Thank you for taking the time to Read this:) hae a Wounderfull year… whats left of it

item.title: Re: Dream Village Recruiting
item.content:encoded: Dream Village has Went Epic still need members everyone is Welcome

item.title: Re: Dream Village Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Dream Village we have around 58 upgrades and get Total: +145 Stamina! a day need some new blood if you join say portwizard sent you thanks and sorry to Bother you if not we are Lead by DemonDream and summon montsters as fast as we kill them
soon as we get the 40 members we will be buying the 40 man upgrades come hang out and have fun I'm always posting retarded stuff on the message board :D

item.title: Re: Dream Village Recruiting
item.content:encoded: ok still looking for 7 good members and we have 50+ upgrades

item.title: Dream Village Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Hey we are a IR with 33 vilagers at the moment we welcome everyone with open arms looking for a few good players to put us at 40 to get the bigger upgrades , we have 39 upgrades at the moment but are holding off on the smaller ones for now

P.S we are IR so only Seaon 2+ or STI players
